page.title: 13A Day in the Life of Lisa
page.content: Today is the Thursday of my half-term holiday. I got up at 8.l5 instead of 7.45 which I do when going to school. For breakfast I had some toast and marmalade and a glass of fruit juice. Because it is a nice day I go round to my friend Michelle'S house and we decide to go to Newmillerdam to feed the ducks. When we have fed the ducks we went to the Beulay Cafe, which is opposite the lake for a drink of pop. In the afternoon we both go to play with some friends who live in the nearby Kettlethorpe Estate. There are some playing fields here so we are able to have a game of rounders. By 5 p.m. Mum is home from work and I have to go home for dinner which will be ready for 6 p.m.when Dad gets home. In the evening I decide to stay in and watch television.
